name: aqua
comment: Core AQUA devices and KOS executable for aquaBSD
desc:
This package installs the core AQUA executable (the KOS) and all that is necessary to read and run ZPK files.
It also installs base devices needed for aquaBSD 1.0 Alps programs to run (in the `aquabsd.alps` devbranch).

WWW: https://github.com/inobulles/aquabsd-pkg-repo/tree/main/packages/aquabsd.alps/aqua
